subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Trail Blazers rallied to defeat the Nets, 109-100, and the Sixers beat the Bulls, 104-101, in the final N.B.A. game at Philadelphia’s 42-year-old Spectrum.
snippet: The Trail Blazers rallied to defeat the Nets, 109-100, and the Sixers beat the Bulls, 104-101, in the final N.B.A. game at Philadelphia’s 42-year-old Spectrum.
